name: Sky-High Fibre Toast - Banana
description: Indulge in a delicious breakfast option with our Sky-High Fibre Toast - Banana recipe. It's a health-conscious choice that's low in sugar and high in nutrients, perfect for those looking to maintain a healthy lifestyle without sacrificing taste. This recipe transforms simple ingredients into a wholesome meal that's both satisfying and nutritious.
recipeIngredient: 0.25  cup ( 8 oz--250 ml ), Ice Cold Water

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix together the sugar substitute, Quick Cook Oats, and Non-Fat milk until well blended.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the banana and cut it into slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Fry the eggs to your liking, preferably using a non-stick pan to minimize the need for added fats.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the whole wheat bread slices until they're golden and crispy.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble the toast by spreading the oat mixture on the toasted bread, add a layer of fried egg and top with banana slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle ice cold water over the assembled toast for added freshness.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
